app_descript:
Mi Fit (Now Zapp Life)

Brief:

Following a significant rebranding, the Mi Fit app, once a cornerstone of Xiaomi's wearables, has evolved into Zapp Life. Accommodating legacy users of Xiaomi devices, the app serves as a central hub for newer Xiaomi wearables, integrating features from both Xiaomi Health and Xiaomi Wear/Xiaomi Wear Lite. Zapp Life promises to enhance the fitness tracking experience with its robust accessibility across different markets and a suite of health analysis tools.
